EmailTemplate.subject: NCS application - your next steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS application - your next steps Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian of (Contact.FirstName)")},
Please complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for NCS
Thank you for starting {!Contact.FirstName} application for NCS, which is part of their course. At the moment, parts of this are not complete and we cannot give {!Contact.FirstName} a place until we have received and reviewed these parts. So, we need you ({!Contact.FirstName}’s parent or legal guardian) to provide:
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_MASI__c} {!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_Consent__c}
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_DOB__c}
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_School__c}
Payment - please pay your admin fee, which is £35 if you pay within {!Contact.FirstName}'s school discount period, or up to £50 if you pay after this. If finding the money is a problem for you, we may be able to help - log in to your online account and select the ‘financial assistance’ option in the payment section, or call us.
The easiest way to do this and complete {!Contact.FirstName}'s application is by logging in to your at online account . If you are unable to complete it online or have any questions, please contact us using the details below – we’re always happy to help.
Please complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application as soon as possible so they can take part in this NCS programme as part of their course.
Yours sincerely,
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
